q: American Civil Liberties Union has uncovered thousands of pages of government documents that show that torture was authorized at the highest levels of the Bush administration. Jameel Jaffer , Deputy Legal Director of the ACLU: Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's claim that the abuse at Abu Ghraib was isolated and aberrational is demonstrably false. Government documents show that the methods used at Abu Ghraib were the same ones Mr. Donald Rumsfeld approved, and that the abuse of prisoners in Defense Department custody was systemic. If there's any` known known,' it's that Donald Rumsfeld joined with other officials to orchestrate a program of torture. This effort to rewrite history is shameful. A billion browser-based phones also means that Google can display advertisements to that many more people around the world. Already, even without achieving each of those developments, interesting services are available, Eric Schmidt said. We are at the point where, between the geolocation capability of the phone and the power of the phone's browser platform, it is possible to deliver personalized information about where you are, what you could do there right now, and so forth-- and to deliver such a service at scale, Eric Schmidt wrote. weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinized companies.`` I don't think Eric Schmidt was pushed. I think he jumped,'' said Ken Auletta , author of Googled: The End of the World As We Know It. `` I think Eric Schmidt is burned out.'' We're not going to give an inch of territory in terms of our domination of the segment, Sergio Marchionne said.`` But we need to completely rethink the minivan. We need to make it a lot more versatile than it is. The architecture will allow us to make a minivan-like vehicle plus others.''

coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed!
